trans-unit.source: Represents the results from a single capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 表示来自单个捕获组的结果。

trans-unit.source: A capturing group can capture zero, one, or more strings in a single match because of quantifiers.
trans-unit.target: 捕获组可以捕获零、 一个或多个字符串中单个匹配项，因为存在的限定符。

trans-unit.source: (For more information, see [Quantifiers](~/docs/standard/base-types/quantifiers-in-regular-expressions.md).) All the substrings matched by a single capturing group are available from the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: (有关详细信息，请参阅[限定符](~/docs/standard/base-types/quantifiers-in-regular-expressions.md)。)单个捕获组匹配的所有子字符串中提供了<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Information about the last substring captured can be accessed directly from the `Value` and `Index` properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关捕获的最后一个子字符串的信息可以直接从访问`Value`和`Index`属性。

trans-unit.source: (That is, the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group> instance is equivalent to the last item of the collection returned by the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A> property, which reflects the last capture made by the capturing group.)
trans-unit.target: (这就是，则<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group>实例是否等效于返回的集合的最后一项<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A>属性，它反映最后一个捕获组执行的捕获。)

trans-unit.source: An example helps to clarify this relationship between a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group> object and the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> that is returned by the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 示例有助于阐明之间的关系<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group>对象和<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>返回<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `(\b(\w+?)[,:;]?\s?)+[?.!]` matches entire sentences.
The regular expression is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 该正则表达式的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Begin the match at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处开始匹配。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more word characters, but as few characters as possible.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个单词字符，但字符要尽可能的少。

trans-unit.source: This is the second (inner) capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 这是第二个 （内部） 的捕获组。

trans-unit.source: (The first capturing group includes the `\b` language element.)
trans-unit.target: (第一个捕获组包括`\b`语言元素。)

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one occurrence of a comma, colon, or semicolon.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或一个匹配项的逗号、 冒号或分号。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one occurrence of a white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 匹配空白字符的零个或一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Match the pattern consisting of a word boundary, one or more word characters, a punctuation symbol, and a white-space character one or more times.
trans-unit.target: 匹配单词边界、 一个或多个单词字符、 一个标点符号，以及包含空白字符一个或多个时间模式。

trans-unit.source: This is the first capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 这是第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: Match any occurrence of a period, question mark, or exclamation point.
trans-unit.target: 匹配句号、 问号或感叹号的任何匹配项。

trans-unit.source: In this regular expression pattern, the subpattern `(\w+?)` is designed to match multiple words within a sentence.
trans-unit.target: 在此正则表达式模式中，子模式`(\w+?)`旨在匹配句子中的多个单词。

trans-unit.source: However, the value of the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group> object represents only the last match that `(\w+?)` captures, whereas the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection> that represents all captured text.
trans-unit.target: 但是，值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group>对象表示仅的最后一个匹配`(\w+?)`捕获，而<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection>表示所有捕获的文本。

trans-unit.source: As the output shows, the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection> for the second capturing group contains four objects.
trans-unit.target: 如输出所示，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection>对于第二个捕获组包含四个对象。

trans-unit.source: The last of these corresponds to the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group> object.
trans-unit.target: 最后一项对应于<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the captures matched by the capturing group, in innermost-leftmost-first order (or innermost-rightmost-first order if the regular expression is modified with the <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft" /> option).
trans-unit.target: 按从里到外、从左到右的顺序获取由捕获组匹配的所有捕获的集合（如果正则表达式用 <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft" /> 选项修改了，则顺序为按从里到外、从右到左）。

trans-unit.source: The collection may have zero or more items.
trans-unit.target: 该集合可以有零个或更多的项。

trans-unit.source: The collection of substrings matched by the group.
trans-unit.target: 由该组匹配的子字符串的集合。

trans-unit.source: If a quantifier is not applied to a capturing group, the collection returned by the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A> property contains a single <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture> object that provides information about the same substring as the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果限定符不应用于捕获组，返回的集合<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A>属性包含一个<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture>对象，提供有关为相同的子字符串的信息<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group>对象。

trans-unit.source: This is illustrated in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 下列示例对此进行了阐释。

trans-unit.source: It defines a regular expression, `\b(\w+)\b`, that extracts a single word from a sentence.
trans-unit.target: 它定义正则表达式， `\b(\w+)\b`，提取单个单词从一个句子。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group> object captures the word "This", and the single object in the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection> contains information about the same capture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group>对象捕获单词"This"，并且中的单个对象<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection>包含相同的捕获有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: The real utility of the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A> property occurs when a quantifier is applied to a capturing group so that the group captures multiple substrings in a single regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 真正的实用程序<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A>限定符应用于捕获组，以便组捕获单个正则表达式中的多个子时发生属性。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group> object contains information about the last captured substring, whereas the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A> property contains information about all the substrings captured by the group.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group>对象包含有关最后一个捕获的子字符串的信息，而<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A>属性包含有关已捕获的组的所有子字符串的信息。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the regular expression `\b(\w+\s*)+\.` matches an entire sentence that ends in a period.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，正则表达式`\b(\w+\s*)+\.`匹配以句点结束的整个语句。

trans-unit.source: The group `(\w+\s*)+` captures the individual words in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 组`(\w+\s*)+`捕获集合中的各单词。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group> collection contains information only about the last captured substring, it captures the last word in the sentence, "sentence".
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group>集合仅包含有关信息的最后一个捕获子字符串，它会捕获该句中"句子"最后一个单词。

trans-unit.source: However, each word captured by the group is available from the collection returned by the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，是从返回的集合可用的组捕获的每个单词<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the capturing group representing by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回由当前实例表示的捕获组的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the capturing group represented by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 由当前实例表示的捕获组的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the match is successful.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示匹配是否成功。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果匹配成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `Success` property is true if at least one substring was captured by this group.
trans-unit.target: `Success`属性为 true，如果至少一个子字符串捕获在此组。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to the Boolean expression (Group.Captures.Count > 0).
trans-unit.target: 它相当于布尔表达式 (Group.Captures.Count > 0)。

trans-unit.source: The input <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see langword="Group" /> object equivalent to the one supplied that is safe to share between multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个与提供的对象等效的 <see langword="Group" /> 对象，在多个线程间共享该对象是安全的。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression <see langword="Group" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个正则表达式 <see langword="Group" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inner" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inner" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。
